name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza
description: Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 300 MB available space
